data.title: Actress Joke Silva celebrates her husband, Olu Jacobs, as he turns 79 today
data.meta_description:
Veteran actor, Olu Jacobs, turns 79 today July 11. His wife, Joke Silva, took to her Instagram page this morning to wish him a happy birthday.

data.text:
Veteran actor, Olu Jacobs, turns 79 today July 11. His wife, Joke Silva, took to her Instagram page this morning to wish him a happy birthday.

'‘Celebrations galore…Joy joy joy with joy my heart is ringing Joy Joy Joy His love for us is known…HAPPY BIRTHDAY Sir J _olujacobs Here is to Good Health , sound mind ,abundance and a longer life.’'she wrote

Happy birthday to him!
